channel.title: I cant play for more than 5 minutes
channel.description:
I was on a really good server not too long ago, soon as i clicked, it did every command.
Me- Finally a lagless server.
* 5 minutes later *
* Logs me off *
This is happened to me some many times, i cant play long enough to even enjoy the game, can someone give me alittle advice...plz?

item.title: I cant play for more than 5 minutes
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Just because a server is online, doesn’t mean it will stay online.

People like you run the servers on their very own computers, so expect the computers to turn off eventually if like the hoster has to go.

You’ve probably just been unlucky, because I doubt anything to do with your computer or internet is causing the problem. Just remember, most servers dont run 24/7.

-TeleNubby

Read full topic
item.source: I cant play for more than 5 minutes
